alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 3:04PM HST until February 01 at 5:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 50 mph with localized gusts to 65 mph expected. Winds are expected to be the strongest overnight, and then begin to subside around daybreak. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 5 PM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
